column4: and the problem is that I can see polish letters in gnome-terminal, in emacs buffers, on console
and not in emacs w3m web browser
I use terminus font so it should show polish letters but I got empty spaces...
could someone help me with this thing?
then it probably doesn't have those characters
I got two terminals - gnome-terminal with font set to terminus and xterm with the same font
I got polish letters in gnome-terminal and I don't in xterm
I did now and no effect
hi it's me again - sorry to bother
I installed almost every package that was related with 'locale'
and now I think that I'm close to solve my problem
the thing is that I started xterm with -en iso8859-2 option
and it says now that "Warning: couldn't find charset data for locale pl_PL.UTF-8; using ISO 8859-1."
maybe you know what can I do with this thing?
